children.html:
The Space is an online project founded through a pioneering partnership between the BBC and Arts Council 
        England that commissions artists and arts organisations to create new work using digital technology for a wide range of audiences.

We're here to help artists, from any creative discipline, become famous. [...] We want things that haven't been done yet.

That makes everybody go "Wow! THAT sounds exciting!"

You can decide you are an artist. And there is no qualification needed.

All there is, is talent and originality.

And I guess ... if you've seen it before, then don't apply !

But if you've got an original, surprising idea, then we're here to help

make it happen.

In times of turmoil, and times of troubles,

we look to our poets for on the ground truth.

Great Art. Digitally.

Dear ambitious You.

That's right! You with the unconventional ideas!

With Art projects too big to realize.

Did you ever consider pioneering an artistic field?

That doesn't even exist yet?
